articles.title: Hollywood era is off to a flyer at Wrexham with an air of comedy surrounding Reynolds and McElhenney - Daily Mail
articles.description: ON THE ROAD - IAN HERBERT: The link back to sublime times on this football field - Mickey Thomas's free kick against Arsenal; Jim Steel's header to defeat Porto - is becoming fainter.
articles.content:
There's no evidence of Hollywood just yet. Only signs that the grass has been growing under Wrexham's feet for far too long.
